meanings.definition: The quality or state of lacking a definite plan, purpose, or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The randomness of the colors in the painting made it hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: She loved the randomness of exploring new places without a map.
meanings.sent3: The randomness of the jigsaw puzzle pieces made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The randomness of the scattered leaves on the ground created a beautiful chaos.
meanings.sent5: The randomness of the music notes created a unique melody.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unpredictable or haphazard.
meanings.sent1: The randomness of the weather kept changing our plans.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the randomness of picking a movie without knowing the plot.
meanings.sent3: The randomness of the cat's movements entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: The randomness of the lottery numbers left everyone in suspense.
meanings.sent5: The randomness of the traffic made her late for the meeting.
